title: Summa Health Medical Group Family Medicine
description: Here you can search for a Summa physician by name, hospital specialty, or location. Take the first step towards better health at Summa Health.
sitename: Dr. Gary E Machado, MD - Fairlawn, OH - Family Medicine
cleaned_text: Gary E Machado, MD Family Medicine Locations Summa Health Medical Group Family Medicine About Gary E Machado Gary Machado, M.D., a Summa Health family medicine physician, has special interests in Chronic Disease Management, Preventative Medicine, Weight Loss Management and Mental Health. He graduated from St. Matthew's School of Medicine in the Cayman Islands and completed a Family Medicine residency at the Summa Health System - Barberton Campus. Dr. Machado is board certified by the American Board of Family Medicine. Expertise Education Summa Barberton Hospital Residency, Family Medicine, 2013 St. Matthews University School of Medicine Medical School, 2009 Ratings & Reviews Surveys are randomly sent by Press Ganey Associates, Inc. to patients after their in-office visit. Press Ganey provides the survey scores to Summa Health. These patient survey scores are noted here and updated on a monthly basis. Insurance Note: This is not an all-inclusive list of health plans. Additional health plans may be accepted. Please contact your insurance provider for confirmation. - Buckeye (Ambetter Product) - Buckeye Advantage (Medicare Product) - Buckeye Medicaid - ChoiceCare - Cofinity - Direct Care America - Emerald Health Network - First Health Network - HealthSmart - Humana Commercial
